title: Go Goa! Hospitality players can't have enough of India's favourite holiday destination
description: As per estimates shared by JLL Hotels & Hospitality Group, India with ET, in 2023, branded hotel openings in Goa recorded an uptick of over 120% and 270% in total number of keys as compared to  2022 and 2019 respectively whereas branded hotel signings in 2023 displayed a 40% growth over 2022
